fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, reveal yourself as the Mayor But With 28 Stab Wounds.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For the rest of the game, your vote counts as 28, a Doctor cannot heal you, you cannot whisper or be whispered to, and you will be dealt 28 consecutive Basic attacks as soon as you reveal.
- You have a (20 * x)% chance to compulsively reveal at the beginning of each day, where x is the day number.
